channel.description: <!doctype html> hw4-veb-tree-description User RequirementsThe task for this assignment is to implement a minimum priority queue implemented using a van Emde Boas tree. The algorithms described below are adapted from Introduction to Algorithms - 3rd edition by Corman, T.H, Leiserson, C.E., Rivest, R.L., and Stein, C. van Emde Boas TreesThe van Emde Boas tree, aka vEB tree, is a tree that utilizes an associative array with u-bit integer keys. This data structure is very efficient in operations it is able to perform (this includes search, predecessor, successor, insert, and delete).
